## Checklist

- No TSLint warnings
- [Style & SASS](https://github.com/cloud-source/hydra/tree/develop/src/app/style)
- `$ npm test`
- `$ npm run build:prod; open dist/www/index.html` (check if `/*@ngInject*/` is missing somewhere if not work)
